subject: Fw: Thank you for your recent refinance debt request, we accepted your appication
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire THIS NIGHT):
$244,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this elementary form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://tmgbood.com/
